name: SKOverlay
desc: A class that displays an overlay you can use to recommend another app or an App Clip’s corresponding full app.

items.name: init(configuration: SKOverlay.Configuration)
items.desc: Creates an overlay you use to recommend another app on the App Store.

items.name: var configuration: SKOverlay.Configuration
items.desc: An overlay’s attributes; for example, its position on the screen.

items.name: class SKOverlay.AppConfiguration
items.desc: An object that represents the attributes of an overlay you use to recommend another app on the App Store.

items.name: class SKOverlay.AppClipConfiguration
items.desc: An object that represents the attributes of an overlay you use to recommend an App Clip’s corresponding full app.

items.name: class SKOverlay.Configuration
items.desc: The abstract superclass for all classes that represent an overlay’s attributes.

items.name: func present(in: UIWindowScene)
items.desc: Presents an overlay in a window scene.

items.name: protocol SKOverlayDelegate
items.desc: Methods for responding to the overlay’s appearance, dismissal, or failure to load.
